snippet: Behind their loud condemnations of President Obama, Republicans continue to damage the economy and society.
abstract: Editorial observes that details of troubles swirling around Obama administration are bluntly contradicting Republicans who want to combine them into seamless narrative of tyrannical government on rampage; contends that political windstorms are merely obscuring real damage that Republican obstruction continues to do to economy and workings of government.
lead_paragraph: Behind their loud condemnations of President Obama, Republicans continue to damage the economy and society.
